Episodes.Title: Gold Mine
Episodes.Plot: The gang are back and despite his better judgement, Mickey gives Danny a chance to run his own scam. However, the object of the scam has a habit of sending con men to jail so the risks for the gang are high. And it doesn't make them feel any better to discover that Danny plans to convince the man, a savvy property developer, that there's a goldmine in the heart of London.
Episodes.GuestStars: Emma Pike, Ronald Pickup, Charlie Creed-Miles, Vincent Franklin, Gresby Nash

Episodes.Title: Confessions
Episodes.Plot: The gang are on the verge of completing a job but Albert's gone AWOL. When he finally appears it's all too late because 'the mark' has pulled out - but Albert has a new plan.
Episodes.GuestStars: Stewart Harwood, Rebecca Lacey, Stanley Townsend, Flaminia Cinque, Phil Atkinson, Maryann Turner, Andrew Havill, Guy Henry, Brett Fancy

Episodes.Title: The Lesson
Episodes.Plot: Danny has found a potential new member of the gang, Trevor (played by Lee Ingleby). He's a short con artist, who's very good at what he does, but his marks are not always the greedy; he also targets the elderly and the poor...
Episodes.GuestStars: Eileen Essel, Lee Cornes, Peter Shea, Brian Hickey, Rick Warren, Andrew Bridgemount, Eleanor Matsuura, Doreen Mantle, Lee Ingleby

Episodes.Title: Missions
Episodes.Plot: The team's plan to con an auction house with a comic book forgery goes awry when corrupt copper, Sam Phillips (played by Fay Ripley), decides she wants in on the play.
Episodes.GuestStars: William Scott-Masson, Stan Rowe, Evelyn Duah, Fay Ripley, Gerrard McArthur, Gregory Floy, Michael Smiley, Nicholas Palliser, Jake Nightingale, Mark Tandy, Kieran Bew

Episodes.Title: Old Acquaintance
Episodes.Plot:
When Stacie claps eyes on her estranged husband Jake who left her five years ago taking everything she owned with him, she's certain he is to be the gang's next mark. Having graduated from the short con world to the professional poker circuit, he's good and he won't be an easy target. But the team swears to exact revenge on him for Stacie.
Is Stacie really prepared to leave her friends for love? Or has she really got another card up her sleeve....?
Episodes.GuestStars: John Harding, Nigel Whitney, Grant Masters, Max Beesley

Episodes.Title: Eye of the Beholder
Episodes.Plot: Mickey's got a plan and this one is like no other. They're going to steal the Crown Jewels. Will he be able to get the others to join him on such a dangerous mission?
Episodes.GuestStars: Katie Wimpenny, Jenny Tarren, Christie Goddard, Daniel Kruyer, Robert Llewellyn, Shirley King, Paul Brooke, Vincent Regan, Liz May Brice
